placeholderImages.description: A person looking at a sunrise over mountains, symbolizing a new beginning and finding a path.
A person looking thoughtful while working on a complex problem, representing the assessment phase.
A futuristic holographic interface displaying charts and data, representing AI recommendations.
A winding path leading up a mountain, representing a career journey.
A person working on a laptop in a modern, bright environment, representing the career co-pilot feature.
